testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: The technical SEO improvements made by this team increased our organic traffic by 150% in just 4 months. Their attention to detail and expertise in modern web technologies is outstanding.

testimonials.name: Mike Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Our Core Web Vitals scores improved dramatically after working with them. Page load times decreased by 60%, and our search rankings improved across the board.

testimonials.name: Lisa Chen
testimonials.content: Professional, knowledgeable, and results-driven. They helped us migrate to Astro while maintaining our SEO rankings and improving performance significantly.

testimonials.name: David Thompson
testimonials.content: The ongoing SEO support has been invaluable. Our organic traffic continues to grow month over month, and we always know we're following best practices.

testimonials.name: Emma Wilson
testimonials.content: Their technical expertise helped us solve complex SEO issues that other agencies couldn't handle. Highly recommend for any technical SEO challenges.
